text: Julian Lawrence is a Canadian cartoonist, educator and comics scholar from Portsmouth, England. A longtime member of Vancouver's DIY independent art scene, Lawrence is also an arts educator and researcher, with a specialization in using hand drawn comics as a tool to improve literacy, develop storytelling techniques and form identity. He currently lives in Middlesbrough, England, where he is a Senior Lecturer in the Comics and Graphic Novels B.A. Honours program at Teeside University. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Canadian cartoonists Category:Canadian academics Category:1963 births
title: Julian Lawrence
